Know more   about me

Hey there, I'm Kamal 👋
In 2021, I built my first website for a marketing agency and learned that great code is just the start – understanding client needs is key.

Since then, I've mastered HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and TailwindCSS to create responsive, user-friendly web experiences. I also have solid SQL Server skills to bridge frontend and backend seamlessly.

Beyond code, my background in freelancing as a media buyer taught me to adapt fast and deliver results.

With countless hours of coding and projects under my belt, I'm passionate about turning ideas into smooth, engaging websites.
Let's build something amazing! 🚀
